release_notes: IMPROVED: Tab header typography - Reduced font weight from bold to medium for better space efficiency
IMPROVED: URL input font size reduced from 13px to 11px - Shows more text for longer addresses
IMPROVED: Collections list font size reduced from 13px to 12px for visual consistency
IMPROVED: All input fields now use 11px font for consistent typography
IMPROVED: Tab horizontal spacing optimized - Reduced padding to show more text before truncation
IMPROVED: Request names now match folder/collection text color in light theme for better visibility
FIXED: Request text appearing too light/gray in light theme - Now uses #424242 like folders
IMPROVED: Better visual hierarchy with consistent font sizing across UI elements
